sourcesContent:
Search for Flight
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure.place}}
{{flight.departure.time | date}}
{{flight.departure.time | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit{ searchResults: any = [ { airline: "VNAirline", arrival: { place: "Hue", time: "11:00AM" }, departure: { place: "SaiGon", time: "8:00AM" }, price: "500.000đ", remainingNumberOfSeats: 40, }, { airline: "VietJet", arrival: { place: "Hue", time: "2:00PM" }, departure: { place: "SaiGon", time: "12:00AM" }, price: "400.000đ", remainingNumberOfSeats: 20, }, { airline: "Bamboo", arrival: { place: "Hue", time: "4:00PM" }, departure: { place: "SaiGon", time: "2:00PM" }, price: "300.000đ", remainingNumberOfSeats: 15 } ]; ngOnInit(): void { } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
